spec_data.Name: libcaca
spec_data.Description:
libcaca is the Colour AsCii Art library. It provides high level functions
for color text drawing, simple primitives for line, polygon and ellipse
drawing, as well as powerful image to text conversion routines.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 23 Feb 2017 01:17:41 PM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Library for Colour AsCii Art, text mode graphics
